_comment: To create an error please add an error ID as the key, then the error message
NoPortOnEnvDetected:
Server start error: No PORT environment variable has been set up!
Have you created the .env file and added the PORT variable?
NoDBURIOnEnvDetected:
Server start error: No database URI detected on the environment variable. 
Have you created the .env file and added the DBURI variable?
